name: Damon Harrison
text: Worst possible bank to use for a mortgage loan! They lie to you during the whole process and when you confront them about it, they blame someone/something else. Unless you want a bubble payment and have them lie to you, do not use them.

name: G W
text: We applied for a mortgage with Scott Nelson. It was a great experience! He is very quick to respond and provided world class service. He showed us how to provide our documentation so we could help the process go smoothly. NobleBank & Trust has high integrity and values. We are now the owners of a beautiful home.

name: Jane Brown
text: Anniston, Oxford & the new Heflin branches have the most amazing, helpful employees!  Anything I have ever needed, from documents to new debit cards have been mine quickly, with a smile!

name: Sherria Rudolph
text: I have been banking with them for about 5 years now.

name: Dylan Hulsey
text: Worst banking experience ever, let my account get hacked random phone numbers without even notifying me, took over a month to get me my debit card, requires you to change your password every 6 weeks because their system isn't secure enough if you don't, changed my address to one that doesn't exist without notifying me, the list goes on and on and on. Just do yourself a favor if you are thinking about banking with noble and DON'T DO IT.

resp.text: Dylan, we apologize for any issues you are having if you could please contact us at 256-741-1800 and we can get to the bottom of the problem.

name: Danielle Fair
text: The anniston and piedmont branches have the nicest and most helpful employees. Savannah, Nikki, Leslie, Latha, and Haley are all part of the pleasant experiences I've had banking with noble for personal and business accts.

name: I.O.U
text: Staff here is so awesome. thank you for allowing me to be part of the noble Trust Bank family

name: Scotti Simpson
text: I have been a Noblebank customer for nearly 15 years. I absolutely love the friendly and consistent service that comes with banking at Noblebank. By far the best bank in the area!

name: Shirley Phillips
text: I love the staff there, they have watched over myself and my son's acct. When suspicious activity, the ladies spotted it & took immediate action. I recommend them to everyone. Thank you for the superior service. God bless you all!

resp.text: Thank you, Shirley! We are honored to have your family bank with us!

name: Sonja Lee
text: These guys look after me and my accounts almost closer than I do! They are top notch.

name: Kathy Wood
text: I live out of state but choose to stay with Noble Bank. Great people and great service!

resp.text: Thank you, Kathy! Don't forget you can continue to use out of state ATMs anytime you need, and we will cover their fee for you! Thank you for sticking with us!

name: darlene martin
text: Love banking at Noble bank the personal is the the best been banking there for years

name: Kim Wilson
text: Greatest people around best banking experience ever both for business and personal

name: Josh Haney
text: Helpful, friendly and treat you like family

name: Katherine Benning
text: Great customer service, great checking and savings plans.

name: Drayke Parris
text: Always great service from friendly staff

name: Lesley Archer
text: I love the small locally-owned family atmosphere of this bank. Every time I have had to call them or stop by with any kind of issue it has been resolved with minimal hassle. The ladies that work behind the counter are so friendly and funny. But everyone that works there has been very easy to deal with. I love my bank.

name: Wales Carter
text: They have really nice people working there and really quick service.

name: Art Of Valor
text: Tellers are very friendly and helpful. Great place to bank for personal and business purposes.

name: Margie Strong
text: Always great. Know who you are. Small town bank

name: Daniel Miller
text: Great customer service.

name: Dewayne Kiker
text: Good bank and good people!
